showScoreExcerpt:
“How beautifully Barry Manilow’s new musical stumbles into our hearts...even though the production implodes with the rush of history, the show starts out quietly, and moves at a comfortable pace, not necessarily an urgent one...Warren Carlyle’s direction is grounded in telling the truth earnestly, and his choreography while minimal, sparkles when it must.”

Read more
